text: chilaꞌ kꞌo wi ri tzujbꞌal ri bꞌantal che qꞌana pwaq, xuqujeꞌ chilaꞌ kꞌo wi ri kaxa rech ri chꞌekom tzij ri chꞌuqtal che qꞌana pwaq. Pa ri kaxa kꞌo wi ri jun xaruꞌ bꞌantal che qꞌana pwaq ri yaꞌtal maná chupam, xuqujeꞌ ri uchꞌamiꞌy ri Aarón ri xtuxik, rachiꞌl ri lajuj taqanik ri tzꞌibꞌatalik cho ri kebꞌ tzꞌalam abꞌaj.
